title: avikz
author: avikz
content: Since last couple of days, my Facebook feed is literally flooded with advertisements from Aviator Crash game. I had installed the app but didn't deposit anything yet. comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I have played this game couple of days, I deposited with our local currency to play it. It's very interested game but you have to be very vigilant enough to cash out otherwise the jet will fly away and that is the end of your fund.For instance, you may stake with $0.01 to $2000 or more which give you multiple of your staking. The total odds accumulated will be subjected or multiple by amount stakes to give you your total Cash out.If you succeed cashing out before the jets fly away then you have gain profits. Note that you can only stake amount you could afford to lose because their is no refund after the jet takes off.
